duties_responsibilities.duty: Select merchandise from the sales floor to fulfill customer online orders.
Sort and unload selected merchandise into refrigeration, frozen, or dry storage areas.
Use digital tools for selecting, packing, and putting away orders in staging areas.
Communicate with department managers and Partners to locate products.
Maintain standards for safety, sanitation, and product freshness.
Provide superior customer service, answer product-related questions, and assist in-store customers.

education_certification.credential: Completion of all required training upon hire
